results.title: ADVANCE Act
results.committees: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation Committee
results.latest_major_action: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
results.summary: Active Duty Voluntary Acquisition of Necessary Credentials for Employment Act or the ADVANCE Act This bill applies commercial driver's license standards for former members of the Armed Forces or reserves to current members of the Armed Forces or reserves.
results.summary_short: Active Duty Voluntary Acquisition of Necessary Credentials for Employment Act or the ADVANCE Act This bill applies commercial driver's license standards for former members of the Armed Forces or reserves to current members of the Armed Forces or reserves.

actions.description: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 409 - 0 (Roll no. 324). (text: CR H5146)
Considered as unfinished business. (consideration: CR H5166-5167)

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2258.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (consideration: CR H5146-5147)
Mr. Graves (MO) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 128.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 115-189.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

votes.question: On Motion to Suspend the Rules and Pass, as Amended
